title: The Fractional Derivative, what is it? | Introduction to Fractional Calculus

media:group.media:title: The Fractional Derivative, what is it? | Introduction to Fractional Calculus
media:group.media:description:
This video explores another branch of calculus, fractional calculus. It talks about the Riemann–Liouville Integral and the Left Riemann–Liouville Fractional Derivative, and ends with an application to the Tautochrone Problem.

Brachistochrone:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=skvnj67YGmw
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cld0p3a43fU

This video was mostly a video adaptation of this article: https://medium.com/cantors-paradise/fractional-calculus-48192f4e9c9f

#calculus #fractional #math

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KNcPoYom2UbF5nyH2tmktfs67kyL7-upfiRKbqu-_BM/edit?folder=0AF8kt9Iej-LyUk9PVA

1:20 Fractional Integration
6:31 The Left R-L Fractional Derivative
11:22 The Tautochrone Problem
